title: Apple calls out Meta for taking almost 50% of Metaverse purchases
content:
Many developers — both indie and big corporations — continue to criticize Apple’s 15-30% commission fee on App Store purchases. For example, Spotify launched a campaign a while back just to pressure the Cupertino tech giant into giving in. Other names include Meta — Facebook’s parent company. Its CEO Mark Zuckerberg has repeatedly called Apple’s

The post Apple calls out Meta for taking almost 50% of Metaverse purchases appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple has called out Meta for planning to take a whopping 47.5% commission fee on digital purchases made in the Metaverse.
